Class Item

  • java.lang.Object
    • Item

  • public class Item
extends java.lang.Object
    Item class for a role-playing game. These are physical things like swords, potions, and tomes.
    Version:
    20160827
    Author:
    Taner Davis

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.lang.String name
      The name of the item
      private int price
      How much the item can be sold for (in gold pieces)
      private double weight
      The weight of the item in fantasy units

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Item()
      Empty (Default) Constructor

      Constructor to create an item given only a name
      Item(java.lang.String name, double weight)
      Constructor to create an Item given a name and weight of the item.
      Item(java.lang.String name, double weight, int price)
      Complete Constructor.
